page.title: 07Transport to and from Well
page.content: Of the 94 households there are 16 with no car,without exception pensioners. Only 3 have no younger family members living near or visiting regularly. Private cars are essential since the bus services have been reduced to 3/week. Tuesday Bedale (Market day) 78p depart 10:50 return 12:50 Thursday Ripon (Market day) 95p depart 10:24 return 14:36 Saturday Ripon depart 8:51 return 13:25 The Ripon buses serve Nosterfield also North Tanfield people can use the daily Masham-Ripon post bus.Snape Lodge residents have none.School buses are free but for pupils only. The nearest railway stations are at Thirsk (19 kms) and Northallerton (20 kms). The nearest airports are Leeds/ Bradford (51kms) and Newcastle (96kms)
